title: The Immortalists
description: When a hooded girl shows up at Rowan Burton's front door on a snowy & windy night, thirteen year old Rowan finds himself in a life altering race to save the girl's life, before two sinister wizards claim the girl for their own. Can Rowan save the girl's life before it's too late? An Immortalist can be identified as many different things... but in this tale, being an immortalist... can cost you your life.
author: Richard P. Denney
